Brainrots.Name: Noobini Pizzanini

Acquisition.Purchase: Buy from central conveyor; ideal for beginners.
Acquisition.Steal: Low priority due to minimal income.
Acquisition.Strategy: Use for early cash accumulation; upgrade to higher tiers quickly.

Brainrots.Description: Noobini Pizzanini is a quirky, pizza-loving novice, embodying the essence of a beginner with a goofy, dough-tossing vibe.

Traits.Name: RIP
Traits.Description: Obtenu lors de l'événement Frightrot. Le brainrot reçoit une pierre tombale avec 'RIP' sur la tête.

Traits.Name: Pumpkin
Traits.Description: Obtenu lors de l'événement Frightrot. Le brainrot reçoit une apparence de citrouille sculptée.

Brainrots.Name: Tim Cheese

Acquisition.Purchase: Buy from central conveyor; suitable for beginners.

Brainrots.Description: Tim Cheese is a quirky, cheese-obsessed mascot, oozing with a playful, dairy-infused charm.

Traits.Name: Sombrero
Traits.Description: Obtenu lors de l'événement Mexique. Le brainrot reçoit un sombrero et un symbole de fête.

Traits.Name: Paint
Traits.Description: Obtenu lors du rituel Chicleteira. Le brainrot laisse des traces de peinture colorée et reçoit un symbole de peinture.

Brainrots.Name: Lirili Larila

Acquisition.Purchase: Buy from central conveyor; affordable for new players.
Acquisition.Steal: Low priority due to low income.
Acquisition.Strategy: Use for early-game cash flow; transition to Rare tiers.

Brainrots.Description: Lirili Larila is a wandering desert elephant with a ticking clock and sandal-wearing cacti, spotting surreal sights.
